Article.ArticleTitle: Characterization of Mass Shootings by State, 2014-2022.

AffiliationInfo.Affiliation: Department of Epidemiology, Colorado School of Public Health, University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus, Aurora.
Injury and Violence Prevention Center, Colorado School of Public Health, University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus, Aurora.

OtherAbstract.AbstractText: This case series investigates the rates of mass shootings, along with injuries and deaths, by US state and shooting type.

MedlineCitation.CoiStatement: Conflict of Interest Disclosures: Ms Barnard and Drs Wright-Kelly, Brooks-Russell, and Betz reported receiving grants from the Colorado Department of Public Health and Environment during the conduct of the study. No other disclosures were reported.
